summary: A unit‑test module that checks the ToCupyd transform correctly converts different Python and library data types—lists, tuples, NumPy arrays, and PyTorch tensors (both CPU and CUDA)—into CuPy arrays for GPU processing.
business_intent: Validate the robustness of GPU‑enabled data conversion in the MONAI library to prevent regressions and guarantee that downstream medical imaging workflows can rely on accurate CuPy tensor handling.
